title: Social Cognitive Theory-Based Manual Wheelchair Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic wheelchair maneuvering techniques and understanding of daily living assistive devices
context.additional_context: A vocational training program for managing accessibility facilities for people with disabilities, designed to strengthen the job competencies of administrative and managerial staff.

learning_goals: Learners acquire the skills to maneuver wheelchairs stably across various terrains while avoiding obstacles.
Learners can reduce fatigue by over 30% by applying biomechanical principles when using a wheelchair.
Learners can explain more than 10 wheelchair maintenance procedures and create inspection checklists.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
